column4: in the preseed file, is there a way to specify which sector offset to start on? any know of an example I can see?
You mean for instance to loopmount a disk image which has been dd'd but contains in the disk image subpartitions etc?
nope. want to start the partition on sector #64, default is #63. Looking to help raid performce by aligning the sector to stripe size
Aaah, OK. Sorry, I don't know how for that one.
